channel.title: Project on Cash Prokop-Weaver
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Cash Prokop-Weaver

item.title: Blog
item.description:
I thought I’d write a little bit about this blog for anyone curious as well as for my future So I can remember what I’ve done, and why. and present Write to think selves.

The purpose of this blog — of me publishing any of these notes, which would otherwise still be written, but for my eyes only — is primarily from my benefit: knowing (hoping) that others will read what I’ve written encourages me to write better and to think critically. It’s good, to some extent, to build something in public. I hope these notes can be of some use to the reader.
